name: Shop Drop
description:
*WARNING: THIS GAME MAY EXPERIENCE LAG AND AUDIO ISSUES ON MOBILE PHONES, PLEASE KEEP THIS IN MIND : )*

CONTROLS:

  • Move left: A, left arrow, or press on the left button on screen.
  • Move right: D, right arrow or press on the right button on screen.
  • Pause: Tab or press the pause button on screen.

This was made as an entry for the Mobile Game Jam on Newgrounds. The theme was "Lots of them", so I made of game where lots of things are coming your way so you gotta either avoid or collect them. 

Follow me on twitter if you want to IDK: https://twitter.com/Vulty_Gamedevs

But definitely follow Noah, who has provided the game's wonderful music: https://twitter.com/cashwarior1

Make sure to check out the game on newgrounds too: https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/853710?updated=1660491609
